alert.note: Alert for Crenshaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Butler, northern Crenshaw and north central Conecuh Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Highland Home to 9 miles east of Georgiana. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Georgiana, Rutledge and Highland Home. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central Alabama.
